title: Happily Ever After Collection
description: A collection of four short stories to bring some sizzle into your summer.No angst - just love!House ArrestJenny Reynolds is having a bad day. Can the hot cop next door make it better? Officer Connor Michaels is certainly willing to try.Love Under Construction.An older man. A younger woman. Coworkers. Off-limits. Can they build something to stand the test of time?StitchesWhen Chloe loses her beloved stuffed koala, Stitch, will the handsome doctor she befriends be able to help? Will her mother admit that Dr. Ian Taylor may be the prescription they need to mend them both and become a family?The Taste of YouWhen Chef Byron Lord decides Julia Nichols needs a lesson in his kitchen, what happens when the simmering heat gets to be too much for both of them? Will she pass the test or will she prove they both have something to learn about life and love?
author: Melanie Moreland
